entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog at times this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 28 April 2023
